sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Productdetails({cartItems,SetcartItems}) { const [data, Setdata] = useState(null); const { id } = useParams(); const [qty,setqty]=useState(1); useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API + "/v1/products/getsingleproduct/" + id) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((res) => Setdata(res.product)); }, []); function addtoCart(){ const newItems = [data,qty] SetcartItems((items)=> [...items,newItems]) } return ( data && (

{data.name}

Product {data._id}

${data.price}

- +

Status: {data.stock>0 ? 'In Stock':'Out of Stock'}

Description:

{data.description}

Sold by: {data.seller}

) ); }
